name: Asim Karim
content: Asim Karim's Homepage Asim Karim Professor Department of Computer Science Syed Babar Ali School of Science and Engineering (SBASSE) Lahore University of Management Sciences (LUMS) Ph.D. The Ohio State University M.S. The Ohio State University B.Sc. UET Lahore E-mail: akarim at lums dot edu dot pk I am interested in data mining and machine learning algorithms and applications. My current research directions include natural language processing of Urdu and other low-resource languages, text categorization and clustering, and causal analysis and inference from observed data. I direct the Knowledge and Data Engineering (KADE) Lab @ LUMS. I also work on assistive technologies for persons with disabilities with particular focus on technologies for persons with vision impairment. My teaching engagements are given below. I have taken a leading role in promoting the inclusion of persons with disabilities at LUMS and beyond. I have developed resources and procedures relevant to PWDs, and I am interested in assistive technology research and development. Please contact me directly if you need to discuss with me in this regard.
